name: AVCaptureDataOutputSynchronizer
desc: An object that coordinates time-matched delivery of data from multiple capture outputs.

items.name: init(dataOutputs: [AVCaptureOutput])
items.desc: Creates a capture output synchronizer for the specified capture outputs.

items.name: var dataOutputs: [AVCaptureOutput]
items.desc: The list of data outputs governed by this data output synchronizer.

items.name: func setDelegate(AVCaptureDataOutputSynchronizerDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Designates a delegate object to receive synchronized data and a dispatch queue for delivering that data.

items.name: var delegate: AVCaptureDataOutputSynchronizerDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate object that receives synchronized capture data.

items.name: var delegateCallbackQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: A dispatch queue for delivering synchronized capture data.

items.name: protocol AVCaptureDataOutputSynchronizerDelegate
items.desc: Methods for receiving captured data from multiple capture outputs synchronized to the same timestamp.
